name: 夏葉
text:
おはよう、プロデューサー
トレーニング、始めたらしいじゃない
trans:
Good morning, Producer.
It seems like training is already underway.

name: プロデューサー
text:
ああ、そうなんだ
だけどなかなか成果が出なくてね
trans:
Ah yes, it is. Although, they can't seem
to make any progress.

name: 夏葉
text:
そうなのね
どうしてかしら……
trans:
Is that so?
I wonder why...

At any rate,
we'll keep going.

Maybe it's time
for a change...

name: 夏葉
text: ええ、努力していれば結果はついてくるものよ
trans:
Yes, if they put in the effort
I'm sure results will come.

name: 夏葉
text:
とにかくと言わず
とことん続けましょう！
trans:
Let's not be dismissive of what happened,
but let's also keep going until the very end!

name: 夏葉
text:
確かに……
もしかしたら何かやり方に問題があるのかもしれないわ
trans:
That could be it...
Perhaps there's an issue with how they're approaching it.

name: 夏葉
text: 少し、一緒に見直してみましょうか？
trans: Let's go check things out to see if we can help.

name: 夏葉
text:
潮時……ねぇ
途中で諦めてしまうの？
trans:
A change... you say? You're saying
they should give up midway through?

name: 夏葉
text:
今まで頑張ってきたんでしょう？
ここでやめたらダメよ！
trans:
Everyone's done their best to get here, right?
It would be wrong to stop now!

name: プロデューサー
text: （うっ……しまった。別のことを言えば良かったな……）
trans:
(Ah…… I screwed up.
I should have said something else……)
